basics.name: Jerry Wu
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am pursuing a B.S. in computer engineering at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in May 2017.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

highlights: Teaching assistant for an introduction to programming class using C
Integrated blockchain technology with mesh networks to create a distributed supply chain with applications in reducing logistical costs for disaster-relief organizations
Assisted with developing a proof of concept in Java; implemented proof of work algorithm
Product development engineering â€“ scan team; tested die and collected shmoo plots; performed timing optimizations to reduce the time and cost of validating a unit
Developed a database viewer and uploader for .csv files using HTML, JavaScript, PHP, and SQL; implemented error checking on upload, significantly reducing the risk of bad data

volunteer.summary: HKN is the honor society for electrical and computer engineers
highlights: Maintain the HKN website with up-to-date information, create event pages to showcase events, and share event pages on chapter's Facebook page
Assist in the planning of various chapter activities
